pages.text: In Hexhaven, only the area within the Build Border is saved.$(br2)In the Overworld, the build border extends from -10,240 to 10,240 on the X or Z coordinate.$(br2)In the Nether, the build border extends from -1,536 to 1,536 on the X or Z coordinate.

We ask that you do not cause any mass destruction within the build border.$(br2)This includes, $(o)but is not limited to$(), Ars spells, mining large sections of surface blocks, or purposely destroying builds.$(br2)Accidents happen, and that's okay. $(l)$(l:https://discord.com/channels/1076365835284787220/1279073945475088475)Contact$()$(l) the mod team$() when they do!
